title: Lawyer for Federal Reserve governor targeted by Trump says firing does ‘irreparable harm’ – US politics live
summary: Lisa Cook's attorney is advocating for her to continue in her position while awaiting a court decision. The request aims to maintain stability during the legal proceedings. A ruling regarding her status is pending.

title: Trump will have been ‘played’ if Putin avoids Zelenskyy meeting, warns Macron – Europe live
summary: French President Emmanuel Macron plans to speak with U.S. President Joe Biden as pressure builds for Russian President Vladimir Putin to agree to bilateral talks by a Monday deadline. The discussions come amid escalating tensions between Russia and Ukraine. Diplomatic efforts are being intensified to address the situation.

title: US Open tennis 2025: Emma Raducanu and Carlos Alcaraz in action on day six – live
summary: Katy Murrells is providing live updates from the third round of an event taking place in New York. Stay tuned for real-time information and highlights from the action. Follow along for the latest developments as they unfold.

title: Addison Rae review – pop’s newest A-lister has the stagecraft of a veteran
summary: Rae, a viral TikTok dancer, has made a transition to performing live, showcasing her confidence and vocal talent. Despite limited live appearances, she captivates audiences with her voice and club-ready beats. Her performances highlight her evolution from social media star to an emerging music artist.

title: Solskjær, Mourinho and a warning for Amorim after Manchester United
summary: In today's Football Daily, two ex-Manchester United managers receive a dismissal in Turkey. Additionally, Thomas Tuchel issues an apology to Jude Bellingham. Highlights from the football world showcase ongoing coaching challenges and player relations.
